Home.desc: The new free platform for team-based project development

card1.title: Developers Profiles
card1.desc: Detailed profile pages for developers. Skills, programming languages and projects that's all it takes.

card2.title: Work for a Porfolio
card2.desc: Work on the project as a team. It will go to all of you in your portfolio, which will help you when you get a job.

card3.title: Find Teams
card3.desc: Just create a project with your idea. Our platform will recommend it to your possible teammates.

card4.title: Potential Employment
card4.desc: Our platform partners with companies. They may notice your project and contact you for employment.

StatusPage.title: Project status
StatusPage.caption: Our team is diligently working on the development of the OpenSpace project. In this project, we tackle numerous interesting and challenging tasks that require attention and a creative approach.
